_sText: Map made on request: Plz make sniper target practice map Target Practice map with moving targets, made for training. Designed for single player, but it is possible to run the map on a server, if mp_limitteams is set to 0. Designed for sniper practice, because the targets are a 1 hit kill, but you can also train with an ak47/m4a1/deagle. Map devided in 7 sections, when you have killed all the targets of 1 section you get 15 seconds to move on before the door closes. I tried to improve the movement of the car in section 7 so it would look more realistic, but for some reason the car kept spawning to the wrong direction(0 270 0), therefor I was forced to check the flag 'Fixed orientation'. If someone knows how to fix this please comment/pm me. Map is not protected from decompiling, because I would like other people to learn from this map, I would like to see other (training) maps with moving targets/parts. PM me if you have any questions. Type this in console to refill your ammo: sv_cheats 1 impulse 101 Please comment and assess. - Black Credits: - Valve - PrivateParts
